name: Sumeria
startIntroPart1: Blessings of the heaven be upon you, oh mighty Gilgamesh, the legendary god-king of the Sumer nation. The stories of your life amaze the world to this day. After your death, the gods welcomed you as one of their kind.
startIntroPart2: O great Gilgamesh, builder of the Sumer might, your people seek your guidance! Will you descend from the heavens to astonish the world with your incredible deeds once again? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: That's enough, prepare to be smashed into the dust!
attacked: You dare to attack a demigod? You will regret this sooner than you think!
defeated: Defeat. A mere mortal emerged victorious. Can't wait to see how long you will last. Even demigods aren't invicible.
introduction: I am Gilgamesh, a demigod who descended to Earth to lead the mighty city of Uruk. Let there be peace among us!
hateLetsHearIt: Just speak, don't waste my time!
afterPeace: Maybe we should celebrate the end of war?
tradeRequest: I present you this trade offer.
uniqueText: All land units move twice as fast on tiles next to rivers. +2 Science in Capital
uniques: [Land] units gain the [Cradle of Civilizations] promotion

name: Israel
startIntroPart1: Oh mighty Solomon, you are rule over the kingdom of Israel after your father, David, died. You rule them with wisdom from God himself and you built a temple for him, too. But tragedy struck after you died. The kingdom has split into two, then soon be conquered by other civilizations.
startIntroPart2: Dear our great king, your people is praying God for rescue them from the darkness! Can you lead them to the light with the wisdom from God? Can you build a civilization thats stand the test of time?
attacked: The Lord presented me your plans. We are prepared!
defeated: Is this how my peaceful reign ends? In a river of blood and suffering...
introduction: I am Solomon, King of the Chosen People. If you seek justice or advice, know that you had found them.
hateYes: The Lord told me it will be wise to accept this offer.
afterPeace: Praise the Lord as he gives peace!
tradeRequest: I present you this trade offer.

name: Phoenicia
declaringWar: We accept you for no longer!
attacked: I am disappointed. Can't we simply trade and avoid the conflict?
defeated: Yes, take my lands. I doubt you will make any better use of them!
introduction: I am Hiram of Tyre. If you are here to trade, let's go straight into business.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: If we are no longer at war, maybe we should trade?
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [Work Boats] units [in all cities]

name: The Hittites
attacked: We would attack you anyway. You are just hastening your defeat
defeated: You were a worthy opponent, but my allies will eventually avenge me.
introduction: I am the mighty Mursilis. Don't get in my way and we shall live in peace.
hateHello: Don't waste much of my time!
hateNo: No one would agree to that. Ever.
hateYes: You can't simply refuse such offer.
afterPeace: You should pray for this peace to last ages!
uniqueText: Iron and Horses tiles yield additional 1 Gold and 1 Production. Receive +10% Production bonus when constructing military units.
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]

name: Armenia
declaringWar: You are a disgrace to this world and I shall end you!
attacked: So that's how you treat others? We shall teach you a lesson.
defeated: I might perish, but my people will never forget all that suffering you have brought.
introduction: I am the great Tigranes. Welcome to the hills of Armenia. I will now leave and pray for our bright future - If you don't mind.
hateHello: Don't waste much of my time!
hateNo: No one would agree to that. Ever.
hateYes: You can't simply refuse such offer.
afterPeace: We shall now pray for the better days!
tradeRequest: I bring you an excellent offer!
uniques: [Mounted] units gain the [Ignore terrain cost] promotion

name: Macrobia
declaringWar: You have had your chance, now prepare for war!
attacked: You DARE declare war on us? We shall make you suffer!
defeated: So that is how it all ends. I've never expected to end as a slave!
introduction: Who are you? I bet You are here to admire our wealth.
hateHello: Don't waste much of my time!
hateNo: No one would agree to that. Ever.
hateYes: You can't simply refuse such offer.
afterPeace: We shall now pray for the better, I mean more profitable, days!
tradeRequest: I bring you an excellent offer!
uniqueText: Earns Gold for killing enemy Land units

name: The Olmec
declaringWar: War! The Feathered Serpent demands sacrificial blood!
defeated: That's the greatest sacrifice I can offer You!
introduction: Were you send by the great Serpent?
afterPeace: What such bloodhirsty beast might want?
uniqueText: May buy National Wonders with Faith.
uniques: May buy [National Wonder] buildings with [Faith] for [1] times their normal Production cost

name: Nok
attacked: Oh, I see. I did not expect anything else from you.
defeated: We might die, but our culture is eternal.
introduction: Welcome to our lands. May there be peace among us!
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
uniqueText: All cities provide 1 copy of Terracotta luxury resource. +1 Science from every Iron. Workers may be expended to instantly create Mine improvement regardless of base terrain
uniques: Gain a free [Free Terracotta] [in all cities]

name: Himyar
declaringWar: You are an obstacle and you shall be removed!
defeated: You may take our lands, but you will never take our pride!
introduction: Welcome to my court. I bet the smell of our Incense got you here.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
tradeRequest: I think that's a fair offer.
uniques: May convert Incense to Myrrh or Frankincense luxury resources
+[15]% Strength if within [1] tiles of a [Desert]

name: Epirus
declaringWar: There can be only one king. Prepare for battle!
attacked: I think my emissary must have been late, I already declared war on you!
defeated: You were a worthy opponent. The gods will welcome me!
introduction: Welcome to Epirus, friend. I am king Pyrrhus. Are you another expenda... I mean Ally... or perhaps a next target of my army?
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: Hail, great lord. This was indeed a good fight.
uniqueText: Can't train Settlers. All military units have + 40% more strength when attacking, but suffer -20% penalty when defending. +25% Production when constructing military units in capital. Workers may be expended to create Outpost improvement.

name: Scythia
declaringWar: I am afraid your reign is over!
attacked: We will sunk you in your own blood.
introduction: Welcome to the steppes. I am Ateas, the king of the Scythian people.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: I hope you've learned something from our last dispute.
